aircraft.value: Albatross Transport - AC-8684-480 at Regional Depot-A

defect_observed.value: Structural fatigue crack at stress point. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Foreign object damage to critical surface

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Access Panels component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 11/11/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 13/11/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 15/11/2024 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 17/11/2024 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 16/11/2024 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao
